articles.title: The Socceroos' 2-1 loss against Argentina at the World Cup isn't the end of a dream, it is the beginning of one
articles.description: Is football a game of chance or destiny? The Socceroos' battle against World Cup giant Argentina felt like both, writes Samantha Lewis.
articles.content:

Aziz Behich receives the ball on the left side of the field, takes a touch with his right, and looks up.
